channel.title: Call me Erick
channel.description: Recent content on Call me Erick

item.title: My Mentoring Style
item.description: Everyone has their own style of mentoring. At least that is what I believe recently, however what does mentoring really mean? You could look at dozen of articles, etimology or people's opinion regarding the meaning of mentoring. For me, mentoring is all about preparing a suitable person to embark their own journey, a greater one. In my definition there are at least several phase involved: Encounter Motivate Nurture Protect Graduate What does suitable person mean?

item.title: About
item.description: Hello, I'm Erick. classified as generalist species. I am currently product guy at LABABOOK, an accounting SAAS with mission to help small business in Indonesia in how they handle their financial literacy. I was previously a CTO and a cofounder of CIAYO Corp. The site This site is build using [Hugo] (https://gohugo.io), and [Call me Sam] (https://themes.gohugo.io/hugo-theme-sam/) theme. This site is designed to be fast, thus static content without bulky features is the key feature of this site.
